summary: This is the verdict sheet from the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell in the Southern District of New York. It lists six counts against her, including conspiracy and substantive charges related to enticing and transporting minors for illegal sexual activity and sex trafficking.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant on trial, facing six criminal counts related to sex trafficking and transporting minors for illegal sexual activity.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: The presiding judge (Honorable) over the criminal case in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Verdict
events.description: The jury's verdict on six criminal counts against Ghislaine Maxwell is recorded on this sheet.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was charged with six criminal counts related to sex trafficking and transporting minors.
The counts include conspiracy and substantive charges for enticing and transporting minors for illegal sexual activity.
The document references 'Minor Victim-1' in Counts Two and Four, and 'Minor Victim-4' in Count Six.
The verdict sheet is a formal court document from the United States District Court.
